text: Ang gi di nohongo dabu a God i Corinth, mo ang gi digau huogodoo ala guu gahi belee hai nia dama dabuaahia a God, ala guu hai nia dama ni Mee i di nadau buni anga gi Jesus Christ, mo nia daangada huogodoo ala e noho i nia gowaa huogodoo, ala e daumaha ang gi Jesus Christ, go di nadau Dagi mo tadau Dagi.1.2 Nnegau 18.1
